title: Tissue Factor, a Membrane-associated Marker of Platelet Activation, Predicts 5-year Cardiovascular Mortality in Coronary Artery Disease Patients.
abstract: Thrombotic risk stratification in coronary artery disease (CAD) patients is an unmet need. CAD patients show increased platelet activation, but its prognostic relevance remains unexplored.
